exerciseChatbot.popUpMessage: By choosing to continue, you agree that your interactions with IrisBot will be processed by Microsoft and OpenAI, with data transfer occurring outside of our university data center. If you do not agree with these terms, please select 'Decline'. To acknowledge this and begin your chat with IrisBot, press 'Accept'.

errors.invalidSessionState: Iris session state is invalid. It is impossible to send messages in this state.
errors.sessionCreationFailed: Could not create a new session.
errors.sendMessageFailed: Something went wrong while sending the message. Please try again later!
errors.rateMessageFailed: Could not rate message. Please try again later.
errors.irisDisabled: Iris has been disabled for this exercise.
errors.timeout: The Artemis server has not sent a response yet. Please don't reload the page.

exerciseChatbot.firstMessage: Hi, I'm Iris! I can help you with your programming exercise. You can learn more about me here.
